titles.title: A resolution notifying the House of Representatives of the election of a Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Requires notification of the House of Representatives of the election of Terrance W. Gainer as Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate.
